events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got is not what I ordered.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for returning the incorrect product and receiving money back.
The support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrectly delivered item.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund?
Here is the order number 123456789 and attached is a picture of the item I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item at no cost to you.
That solution sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return label.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return label has been emailed to you for returning the incorrect item.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that the return process went smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case as the refund has been completed and your issue resolved. Thank you for contacting our support.
